page.title: 04A SCHOOL MORNING
page.content:
I get up at 7.00 am.I have my breakfast at about 7.30 am.I have a bowl of Corn Flakes and a cup of tea. At 8.00 I get my clothes on.At about 8.30 I leave for school.It takes 25 minutes to walk to school. We go into school at 9.00 and go to the hall for assembly.We get back to class at about 9.50 and we may do S.M.P. mathematics. At 10.40 there is playtime and I often play rounders.This is a game where you have to hit a ball with a bat and run round four bases without stopping before the other team tap the base with the ball.
We go back to class at 11.00 and we may do writing until 12.00 when we learn French.We have lunch at 12.20.I have crisps, sandwiches and a "Penguin" biscuit.
